name: The Demon's Maze
description:
A little girl has taken the quest of helping a forest spirit recover its abilities! It cannot move without them! Will you help them?

Go on an adventure inspired by old platformer games, and go through a giant forest, meeting various animals. Be careful though, they're hostile! Could there be an evil presence in the forest? Better investigate!

As per this post from last year's jam:
Jam Disclaimer: I fixed some bugs and added various statements around the game to warn that the game wasn't finished (and fixed a typo), after it was submitted. Before it would simply crash when encountering a missing area.
